API Reference¶

Users Service¶

services.users_service.app.admin_delete_user(user_id: int)¶

Admin-only endpoint to delete a specific user by ID.

services.users_service.app.admin_update_user(user_id: int)¶

Admin-only endpoint to update another user’s profile and role.

Allowed fields: first_name, last_name, username, email, password, role.

services.users_service.app.confirm_password_reset()¶

Confirm a password reset with the provided token and new password.

services.users_service.app.delete_my_account()¶

Delete the currently authenticated user’s account.

Note: Later we may discuss how this interacts with bookings/reviews.

services.users_service.app.end_audit_logging(response)¶
services.users_service.app.get_all_users()¶

Return all users. Admin-only endpoint.

services.users_service.app.get_my_profile()¶

Return the profile of the currently authenticated user.

Requires Authorization: Bearer <token>

services.users_service.app.get_service_logs()¶

Return the last N lines from the service log. Admin only.

services.users_service.app.get_user_by_username(username: str)¶

Get details of a specific user by username.

  • Admin: can view anyone.

  • Regular: can only view themselves.

services.users_service.app.handle_smart_room_exception(e)¶
services.users_service.app.login()¶

Log in a user and return an access token.

Expected JSON: {

“username”: “…”, “password”: “…”

}

services.users_service.app.register_user()¶

Register a new user.

Expected JSON body: {

“first_name”: “…”, “last_name”: “…”, “username”: “…”, “email”: “…”, “password”: “…”, “role”: “regular” # optional

}

services.users_service.app.request_password_reset()¶

Request a password reset token. Always returns a generic message.

services.users_service.app.start_audit_logging()¶
services.users_service.app.update_my_profile()¶

Update the profile of the currently authenticated user.

Allowed fields: first_name, last_name, username, email, password. Role change must be done by admin via /users/<user_id>.

services.users_service.app.validate_email(email: str) → str | None¶

raise error message if invalid, else None.

services.users_service.app.validate_username(username: str) → str | None¶

raise error message if invalid, else None.

Rooms Service¶

services.rooms_service.app.add_room()¶
services.rooms_service.app.delete_room_endpoint(room_id: int)¶

Delete a room and its equipment associations.

services.rooms_service.app.end_audit_logging(response)¶
services.rooms_service.app.get_all_rooms()¶

Fetch all rooms from the database. Returns a list of rooms with their details.

services.rooms_service.app.get_room(room_id)¶

Fetch a single room by its ID. Returns the room details if found.

services.rooms_service.app.get_room_status(room_id: int)¶

Returns all bookings for the room and computes available time intervals for the day.

services.rooms_service.app.get_service_logs()¶

Return the last N lines from the service log. Admin only.

services.rooms_service.app.handle_smart_room_exception(e)¶
services.rooms_service.app.set_unset_out_of_service_endpoint(room_id)¶
services.rooms_service.app.start_audit_logging()¶
services.rooms_service.app.toggle_room_availability(room_id)¶

Toggle the availability of a room.

services.rooms_service.app.update_room_details(current_name)¶

Reviews Service¶

services.reviews_service.app.delete_review_endpoint(review_id)¶

Delete an existing review.

services.reviews_service.app.end_audit_logging(response)¶
services.reviews_service.app.flag_review(review_id)¶
services.reviews_service.app.get_all_reports()¶

Fetch all reported reviews.

services.reviews_service.app.get_all_reviews_endpoint()¶

Admin-only endpoint to fetch all non-hidden reviews.

services.reviews_service.app.get_service_logs()¶

Return the last N lines from the service log. Admin only.

services.reviews_service.app.handle_smart_room_exception(e)¶
services.reviews_service.app.hide_review_endpoint(review_id)¶

Hide or unhide a review. - Regular users can hide their own reviews (cannot unhide once hidden). - Admins/Moderators can hide or unhide any review.

services.reviews_service.app.report_review_endpoint(review_id)¶

Report an inappropriate review.

services.reviews_service.app.reviews_by_room_id(room_id)¶

Fetch all reviews for a specific meeting room.

services.reviews_service.app.start_audit_logging()¶
services.reviews_service.app.submit_review()¶

Submit a review for a meeting room.

JSON body: {

“room_id”: 1, “rating”: 5, “comment”: “Great room!”

}

services.reviews_service.app.unflag_review(review_id)¶
services.reviews_service.app.update_review_details(review_id)¶

Update an existing review.

JSON body can include any of: {

“rating”: 4, “comment”: “Updated comment”

}
